personalInfo.name: Kishore Kumar S S
personalInfo.title: Backend Engineer & AI Specialist
personalInfo.summary: Passionate Backend Engineer and AI Specialist with expertise in building scalable cloud-native applications and developing explainable AI solutions. Experienced in designing robust microservices architectures, implementing ML/DL models, and driving innovation through research in predictive healthcare and environmental monitoring systems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

achievements: Architected and deployed microservices handling 10M+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime
Reduced API response time by 40% through database query optimization and Redis caching implementation
Led team of 5 engineers in migration from monolith to microservices architecture
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting system using Prometheus and Grafana
Mentored junior developers on best practices for scalable backend development
Developed explainable AI models achieving 94% accuracy in diabetes prediction with SHAP integration
Built end-to-end ML pipeline for model training, validation, and deployment on cloud infrastructure
Published research on context-aware recommendation systems in peer-reviewed conferences
Reduced model inference time by 60% through optimization and quantization techniques
Designed and developed BankOps Portal serving 500+ internal users for operations management
Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control using OAuth 2.0 and JWT
Automated deployment pipeline reducing release time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Created comprehensive API documentation and developer onboarding guides

projects.title: Advanced Diabetes Prediction System
projects.description: ML-powered early detection system for diabetes with explainable AI
projects.problem: Traditional diabetes screening methods lack early detection capabilities and provide no insight into risk factors, leading to late diagnosis and poor patient outcomes.
projects.approach: Developed ensemble ML models combining Random Forest, XGBoost, and Neural Networks with SHAP explainability layer to identify key risk factors and provide personalized predictions.

projects.title: AI-Driven Water Stress Monitoring
projects.description: Satellite imagery analysis for predicting agricultural water stress
projects.problem: Farmers lack real-time insights into crop water stress, resulting in inefficient irrigation practices and reduced crop yields.
projects.approach: Built deep learning pipeline using CNN and LSTM models to analyze multispectral satellite data and predict water stress levels with temporal forecasting capabilities.

projects.title: BankOps Portal
projects.description: Enterprise operations management platform for banking workflows
projects.problem: Manual banking operations led to processing delays, human errors, and lack of real-time visibility into transaction statuses.
projects.approach: Designed full-stack portal with automated workflow engine, real-time dashboards, and integration with core banking systems using microservices architecture.

projects.title: VitHub - Vitamin Deficiency Detector
projects.description: Mobile app using computer vision to detect vitamin deficiencies
projects.problem: Vitamin deficiencies often go undiagnosed until severe symptoms appear, especially in underserved communities without access to medical testing.
projects.approach: Developed mobile-first ML solution using transfer learning on MobileNet to analyze facial and skin images for detecting signs of vitamin deficiencies.

projects.title: Context-Aware Intervention as Prevention
projects.problem: Generic health interventions fail to account for individual context, lifestyle, and environmental factors, reducing effectiveness.
projects.approach: Built context-aware recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and deep learning to provide personalized preventive health interventions based on user behavior, location, and health metrics.

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Scalable analytics platform for business intelligence
projects.problem: Businesses struggled with delayed insights from batch-processed data, hindering real-time decision-making capabilities.
projects.approach: Architected real-time streaming analytics platform using Kafka for event ingestion, Spark for processing, and interactive dashboards for visualization.

research.title: Explainable AI for Healthcare: A Context-Aware Approach to Predictive Modeling
research.authors: Kishore Kumar S S, et al.
research.abstract: Novel framework for integrating explainability into deep learning models for healthcare predictions.

research.title: Multi-Modal Learning for Environmental Monitoring Using Satellite Imagery
research.venue: International Conference on Machine Learning Applications (ICMLA)
research.abstract: Deep learning approach for analyzing multispectral satellite data to monitor agricultural and environmental conditions.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Professional Machine Learning Engineer

awards.title: Best Innovation Award
awards.description: For AI-driven water stress monitoring system
